method.title: Method
method.description: The HTTP verb to perform the request with.

url.title: URL
url.description: The URL to make the request with.

endpoint.title: Endpoint
endpoint.description: The endpoint to call in relation to the base URL used by the connector. E.g: '/department/marketing/employees'.

fullUrl.title: Full URL
fullUrl.description: The full URL to make the request against. Must begin with `http://` or `https://`.

headers.title: Headers
headers.description: Headers to include in the request.

queryParams.title: Query Params
queryParams.description: Query parameters to be supplied with the request.
